  **What is SSD-Caching?**
  
  With our SSD-Cache VPS plans, you get benefits such as RAID 10 arrays, with the added bonus of SSD-Caching. What this means is that when a heavy disk I/O work load comes along, that activity will be moved to the SSD arrays to be processed there. This ensures that the overall HDD array will have consistent speeds even under heavy work loads.
